String.string: The {@creature:46#304#argonomorph jalmaraks} have argonized horns that we need to study.
If the argons can corrupt a faerie, we're in big trouble.
Kill {@creature:46#304#argonomorph jalmaraks} in the {@Rgn:46007$$Raga Evala Depths} and get argonized horns.
Go back to the entrance of the {@Rgn:46007$$Raga Evala Depths} and deliver the argonized horns to {@creature:246#1029$$Gloann}.
Go to {@creature:246#1102$$Nevian} in the {@Rgn:46016$$Mindcrown Chamber} in the {@Rgn:46008$$Raga Kabash Depths}.
